item.title: About
item.description: Hi, I’m Dan. I work in IT and I’m currently a Solutions Engineer for 1E, a major player in an emerging technology space - Realtime Endpoint Management. I’ve been involved with Endpoint Management for over 20 years, with a large focus on OS and Application Deployment, Endpoint Security, Automation and and Privileged Access Management. My background is system administration for a global financial services company in Dublin, Ireland, where I worked for a large portion of my career.
